abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column looks at soccer apps that deliver match updates, opinions and diversions.
lead_paragraph: Whether you call it football or soccer, the sport is well represented in a host of apps that deliver scores, footage and more.

headline.main: Video Feature: Putting the Soccer Pitch in the Palm of Your Hand
headline.print_headline: Putting the Pitch in the Palm of Your Hand

snippet: Whether you call it football or soccer, the sport is well represented in a host of apps that deliver scores, footage and more.
